parameters.name: Info
parameters.description:
The information about the Windows system vulnerability. The value is a JSON string that contains the following fields:

*   **name**: the name of the vulnerability.
*   **uuid**: the UUID of the server on which the vulnerability is detected.
*   **tag**: the tag that is added to the vulnerability. Set this field to **system**, which indicates Windows system vulnerabilities.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and response. Default value: **zh**. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese
*   **en**: English

parameters.name: OperateType
parameters.description: The operation that you want to perform on the vulnerability. Set the value to **vul_fix**, which indicates vulnerability fixing.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description: The type of the vulnerability. Set the value to **sys**, which indicates Windows system vulnerabilities.
